node.name: lacp
node.description: Configuration and operational state data for LACP protocol operation on the aggregate interfaceNone

node.name: config
node.description: Configuration data for LACPNone

node.name: system-priority
node.description: Sytem priority used by the node on this LAG interface. Lower value is higher priority for determining which node is the controlling system.None

node.name: state
node.description: Operational state data for LACPNone

node.name: system-priority
node.description: Sytem priority used by the node on this LAG interface. Lower value is higher priority for determining which node is the controlling system.None

node.name: interfaces
node.description: Enclosing container for the list of LACP-enabled interfacesNone

node.name: interface
node.description: List of aggregate interfaces managed by LACPNone

node.name: name
node.description: Reference to the list keyNone

node.name: config
node.description: Configuration data for each LACP aggregate interfaceNone

node.name: name
node.description: Reference to the interface on which LACP should be configured. The type of the target interface must be ieee8023adLagNone

node.name: interval
node.description: Set the period between LACP messages -- uses the lacp-period-type enumeration.None

node.name: lacp-mode
node.description: ACTIVE is to initiate the transmission of LACP packets. PASSIVE is to wait for peer to initiate the transmission of LACP packets.None

node.name: system-id-mac
node.description: The MAC address portion of the node's System ID. This is combined with the system priority to construct the 8-octet system-idNone

node.name: system-priority
node.description: Sytem priority used by the node on this LAG interface. Lower value is higher priority for determining which node is the controlling system.None

node.name: state
node.description: Operational state data for each LACP aggregate interfaceNone

node.name: name
node.description: Reference to the interface on which LACP should be configured. The type of the target interface must be ieee8023adLagNone

node.name: interval
node.description: Set the period between LACP messages -- uses the lacp-period-type enumeration.None

node.name: lacp-mode
node.description: ACTIVE is to initiate the transmission of LACP packets. PASSIVE is to wait for peer to initiate the transmission of LACP packets.None

node.name: system-id-mac
node.description: The MAC address portion of the node's System ID. This is combined with the system priority to construct the 8-octet system-idNone

node.name: system-priority
node.description: Sytem priority used by the node on this LAG interface. Lower value is higher priority for determining which node is the controlling system.None

node.name: members
node.description: Enclosing container for the list of members interfaces of the aggregate. This list is considered operational state only so is labeled config false and has no config containerNone

node.name: member
node.description: List of member interfaces and their associated status for a LACP-controlled aggregate interface. Member list is not configurable here -- each interface indicates items its participation in the LAG.None

node.name: interface
node.description: Reference to aggregate member interfaceNone

node.name: state
node.description: Operational state data for aggregate membersNone

node.name: interface
node.description: Reference to interface member of the LACP aggregateNone

node.name: activity
node.description: Indicates participant is active or passiveNone

node.name: timeout
node.description: The timeout type (short or long) used by the participantNone

node.name: synchronization
node.description: Indicates whether the participant is in-sync or out-of-syncNone

node.name: aggregatable
node.description: A true value indicates that the participant will allow the link to be used as part of the aggregate. A false value indicates the link should be used as an individual linkNone

node.name: collecting
node.description: If true, the participant is collecting incoming frames on the link, otherwise falseNone

node.name: distributing
node.description: When true, the participant is distributing outgoing frames; when false, distribution is disabledNone

node.name: system-id
node.description: MAC address that defines the local system ID for the aggregate interfaceNone

node.name: oper-key
node.description: Current operational value of the key for the aggregate interfaceNone

node.name: partner-id
node.description: MAC address representing the protocol partner's interface system IDNone

node.name: partner-key
node.description: Operational value of the protocol partner's keyNone

node.name: counters
node.description: LACP protocol countersNone

node.name: lacp-in-pkts
node.description: Number of LACPDUs receivedNone

node.name: lacp-out-pkts
node.description: Number of LACPDUs transmittedNone

node.name: lacp-rx-errors
node.description: Number of LACPDU receive packet errorsNone

node.name: lacp-tx-errors
node.description: Number of LACPDU transmit packet errorsNone

node.name: lacp-unknown-errors
node.description: Number of LACPDU unknown packet errorsNone

node.name: lacp-errors
node.description: Number of LACPDU illegal packet errorsNone
